S.FORM: kalingu king (pinaywanan:kalingu；pinairangan:Hoa-lian-koān / Hoa-liân-koān；nginaingayngan:Fâ-lièn-yen)izua tauta sicuayan a ngadan cilay , huilan (pinairangan:Huê-liân),duluman (a sipanya kai:Turoboan；pinairangan:To-lô-boán)avan nangata ca king nua i taiwan. imaza i pasakacedas tua taiwan, izua peihuikuisiyen pakamaza. a i pasakaledep a gadugaduan i vecekadan tua taiwan, a i tua sevecevec ljavek a gadugaduan imaza i pasacemedas, a i tjaikacedas mavan a taipingyan (ljavek a viliping), a i viri nakidjekec tua yilan, a i pasakaledep a viri nakidjekec tua taiciu hici, a i kaledep nakidjekec tua nantuking, a i pasakaledep a navalj nakidjekec tua takaw hici, a i navalj nakidjekec tua taituking. izua tu 4,628 km² a pulingetjan nua kadjunangan. a tjaljaqacavan a king i taiwan. kalinguking izua tjatjuruvuan a kacalisian, tjalja liavan amizuku. au aza caucau a mamaza i pasaviri a kalingu a sema taitu sevesevec a lizulizuk pakaljaviljaving ta ljavek a kadjunangan, au avan ca ika kinapalak nanemanemanga a kakivangvangan racev saka masan tjalja pungadan, izua tairugu nua kuka kinakalevelevan kadjunangan kata yusan nua kuka kinakalevelevan kadjunangan. aza kinipuvarung tua na king a hata avan za cemedas a qadaw kemasi ljavek a ljivavaw. au sinipukelang taljar nua taipingyan. aza taljar pinaka papapiliqe tua mareka zuku a quljaw, izua amizuku, tairuku zuku, bunun zuku, kemalan zuku, sacilaya zuku, sidiqe zuku kata pairang. saka ka 2013 a cavilj, na djemamek tua tjaljabulayan a kakaizuanan a hici masan daisanmin. aza caucau i hualian hici, djian guan kata sincen guan mata drusa puluq kudraw, masan tjaljaqacavan, tjalja taliduan, tjalja salenguwaq a hici i pasakacedasan a kadjunangan. kadjunangan a kinalangan nua kadjunangan ladruladruq i kalingu king saka matu kaiku, maka ljaviljaving kemasi viri patje navalj tu 137.5 km, a kemasi kacedas patje keledep kimaya 43 km. imaza a pulingetjan nua kadjunangan masan a tjaljaqacavan a king i taiwan. ljakua tjaliaw a gadu izua, keri tu 10% a kazatjan pakata penuljat ta kadjunangan. aza mareka caucau sedjelja i kalingu kata valangaw sevesevec a lizulizuk. au izua tu 70% a caucau sedjelja i hualien hici kata djian guan. aicu gadu imaza a pasakacedas a ljavek a gadugaduan, a pasakaledep sedjel a gadugaduan i vecekadan tua taiwan. a lava izua tu 3 mata 9 km a pasalavan. aicu kadjunangan pakata sevesevec a lizulizuk kata avan za nakemasi gadu seqaljutj a qipu kata vudas masan lizulizu, a qivu kalingu kata valangaw sevesevec a lizulizuk tuki kalingu kata valangaw a kasintan. aza kadjunangan pakata pasaviri sedjel kalingu kata valangaw sevesevec a lizulizuk, kemasi cungde a disiaba i siulin guan pasanavalj mata hualien siljitaladj i pana, au aza kemasi sincen mula i sincen guan mata guvu mula i hualien hici a 15 km a tideq, na lizuk a laruq kata lavan pinapamaw nasekeljan tu malji, a tjalja lavan kimaya 5 km a tjeza, saka a qivu "kalingu kata valangaw a kasintan", nutja kinemenemen ca ljusepisepitj a lizuk kinadjunangan, avan nu kemasi liwu pana izaya naseqaljutj a vadas kata qaciljay, lja namakeren a mavali tua pasakacedas ma viri a kemaledep a masan, cuayanga djiqeseng nua zaljum aza i tua siljisaaw ljavek a mareke vudas, pasa navaljen a kacuing avan nu sika alang, kata na tjalja taladjan a kadjunangan siraruwa neka ravac a kanki. lja aicu a ljaviljaving a gadugaduan i pasakacedas a kalinguking tja kigalju a ma alang(kimaya 400 kudraw tjaisangas a inalangan), a ljavavavan tja liaw pitja keri tua i pasaviri a vecekadan gadugaduan, tjalja vavavan avan za sinking gadu izua 1682m. a maka ljaviljjaving a gadu kinaqipuan liaw a vudavudas na lumeljak maqepu masan qaciljay, a kinakadjunangan madjulu a makapalak, lja nururalarua a tjataladj a kadjunangan, aicu a makaljaving a gadu nu icining ljivavae tu 3cm, aza i siukuluan pana qaciljaciljaing izua caleqilj lumeljak a maletimalji masan alang tua vikivikng, avan nu liaw qaca keri maljetimalji a lizuk I tua ljaving naljavek a gadugaduan, pacual ta i ruisui guan kacedasan navalj a cimi lizuk, tjalja laruqan kata tjalja milavan kimaya izua 2 km, kalingu 64 guan a djaljang (花64鄉道) sipakacevung nua lisuy kata vunbing a djalang angata. izua tjalja tjuruvuan a gadu i kalingu king, izua 43 a gadu tjljaqaca mata 3000 m. izua nanhu gadu , cilay gadu , siukuluan gadu ,wumin gadu , akana hehuan gadu i pasakacedasan . aza liaw pana imaza seqaljudj kemasai kaledep pasa cemedas. ljakua aicu heping pana, liwu pana kata siuguluan pana seqaljudj kemasi viri pasa navalj. au izua hualien pana seqaljudj kemasi navalj pasa viri. aicu maka ljaviljaving ta ljavek i pasakacedas a kalingu tu 124 km, lja liaw a pana maljavek, liaw a kadjunangan a temalimuzav, izua cevaceva maka ljavek, avan angata i pasanavalj a heping pana aza cinsui danggay, izua tjaljaqaca 1000 m, masan ta pungadangadan a kivangavangan i suhua kunglu, ljakua izua rucunuq uta pakata qudjalj saka ika maqati qemalius. au aicu i pasanavalj kalingu king a semen makaljaving, namasan tjacaleqilj a ljaviljaving puqaciljayven, izua liaw a napakisumalji nua kadjunangan a temalimuzav, izua setiping pakanavalj, aza kinaqaciljayan matu a tjaljitjali paka italadj a ljavek, izuanan kinapalak nua zaljum a namasa gisui, dangai, kaizatjan, paljevavaw a maljimalji a qaciljay, aza i makaljaving tua ljavek avan za babelubeluan a masan talituan i taiwan. kalevelevan cinalivatan ka sicuayan a qivu cilay, pakata "花蓮縣志" za vecik, ka 1622 a cavilj azua sipanya caucau semamaza a djadjasen ta king, au sematjez patje djinbauli (i djinsan ci atalasi taihuku hici tucu), saka sinpungadan duluman aicu avan tucu sincen mula, a kacalisian a kinaizuanan. ka 1851 a cavilj, izua tjawcikel na semamaza a pairang a qemulic a temalem ta lami, au pacun ta pana sema ljavek, macacuvung qaca a luduludan, azua ridiu matu vuliljauljaw, avan anga ta sinpungadan huilan. au pavalitan ta pinairangan tjasedjaljep siqivu a hualian. tja kigalju a mirazek i kalingu pakata zuma king, ka 1932 a cavilj, nekanan na sipakaljaving a djalan (sicuayan a suhua kunglu), nu remaketj sikipacacikel maka kalingu pakavarukurukur, avan nu izua angata italadj qinaljan au manu sinan i casaw a kadjunangan aya qivu. mata qamaqacuvung a lemindjel tua kisiya a djalan a cemalivat tua taiwan i pasa viri, naseljenguwaq a sipakazua djalan. pakata remasudj a kilalaing takakudan, ka 1909 a cavilj, kalinku a kadjunangan kidjuvecik valangaw, masan ta kalingukang ting, avan kanri a macidjilj patje tucu. kapuamin a maqaqeci, ka 1946 a cavilj icigac siva qadaw lemindjel tua kalingu king. ka 1950 a cavilj ziugac puluq sa lima qadaw, masantjasangas a king a semusu tua niamadju a rarasudjan pakata "cunghuamingu a tjaljavavaw a hulic". kanri tua na i qinaljan a kakudan. kinapangaljan a paljavak izua siulin, wanrung, zusi avan angata na kacalisian a qinaljan, au pulingetjan nua kadjunangan penuljat avan tu alu puluq nua kalingu king a kadjunangan. aza siulin avan na tjaljaqacavan a kadjunangan, tu 1,641 km², avan angata tjaljaqacavan a kadjunangan pakata masantjelulj a kinapangaljan a paljavak, tjaljaqavan ta sinzuking kata canhuaking. aza yiliceng a kadjunangan tu 252 km², masan tjaljaqacavan pakata ceng i taiwan. hualien hici kata sincen guan izua mamaw a pulingetjan nua kadjunangan (tu 29.4095 km²), madrusa avan angata tjaljakedrian pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak i kalingu. caucau · ljemeqaca:neka · mirazek:siulin · ika pasekakezeng:sincen ,djian · sisekez:zusi ,vunglin · mekedri:zuvung ,vuli ,kuangvu ,lisuy · selapay mekedri:wanrung ,hualien hichi ,yili ,vungbin aicu a pakeljan ta caucau i kalingu king: aza mareka caucau sedjelja i hualien hici kata djian guan. aicu a caucau i cen (yilicen kata vunglincen) tjalja kerian a caucau i djian guan, au aicu a caucau penuljat madrusa a ceng tjalja kedrian ta i djian guan a caucau. malua a caucau i vunglin, 90 a caucau /km², avan angata tjalja kerian a mavalidan i taiwan. aicu a caucau i djian guan tu alu kudraw, avan angata tjalja tjuruvuan a guan i taiwan. pakata caucau a mavalidan avan pitjavavaw 100 a caucau /km², izua hualien hici, djian guan kata sincen guan. aicu ziriu patekuteku kemasi 2021 a cavilj sangac 資料 kakivauvaljan:Wayback zuku ka 1926 a cavilj aza ziriu pakata semupu ta caucau a penuljat, izua 9900 a caucau nasevudjan, 7200 a caucau nasekuangdung. (ka cinting a djiday kata min a djiday pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak izua vudjansen kata kuangdungsen) lja tja kigalju a mirazek, izua tjatjuruvuan a sikakudan na kacalisian imaza: izua amizuku, taiya zuku, tairuku zuku, bunun zuku, sacilaya zuku, kemalan zuku, sidiqe zuku i kalingu. pakata ziriu ka 2016 a cavilj sepatj qiljas, a caucau na kacalisian i kalingu, izua 56,362 a caucau i lizuk, izua 35,830 a cuacau i gadu, au a caucau a penuljat avan 92,192. avan angata ta 25 % tua kalingu a caucau a penuljat. au tjaljaqacavan a kadjunangan a amizuku. saka izua tauta 30 % a ngaingai zuku, pirang kata ciyukuk zuku i maza. nasidjaravacan sinupuan aza ziriu ka 2009 a cavilj pakata kalingu sihu, tucu izua lima a daigaku, puluq sa tjelu a kaucung a gaku, drusa puluq sa sepatj a gaku na kutjung kata taiday sa pitju a gaku na kukumin. ljakua a caucau sedjelj a nasemasasaw, au memapulju a situ, izua gaku rinevuranga. kakipucemelan kivangavangan pakata ziriu a "台灣博物館名錄" ka 2004 a cavilj siva qiljas, izua sasqetjan ta paridiu a sicuacuayan a nanemanga umaq i kalinguking : a i kalingu riuku mirazek aravac, sasanguwaq a kadjunangan izua tairuku a nua kuka kakivangvangan, kalingu sema taitu sevesevecan a lizulizuk kata paka ljaviljaving. a remayurangan a sengsegnan temalidu aravac, saka liaw a kasiuljayan a umaq, mata siva taiday a makalap, au izua liaw a racev, vencik tua kasiw,vencik tua qaciljay, vurasi a cinekuru aljualju,yukan, mareka maljaljian a qaciljay. aza ziriu pakata caucau kivanvang a semamaza pakata ziriu a kuankuangcy na kalingu kingsihu ka 2019 a cavilj pitju qiljas, aza caucau kivanvang a semamaza tu 1,352,774. izua tu 281,500 a caucau sema dungdamen yachi, izua tu 34,775 a caucau sema i nanan pakata sasekezan kata papavelian a kakituluan. avan angata tjaljavavavan ta vecik pitjaivililj. au aza penuljat a caucau semamaza ka 2019 a cavilj 10,956,540. (penapamapamaw lemita qiljas avan 913,045 a caucau), masan a sangasangasan. sinkiw aicu a kalingu king i pasakacedas nua i taiwan, izua malji a qivu "pasaliku ta gadu". avan nu tjaljaqacavan a kadjunangan a king i taiwan. avan ca ika kinapalak nanemanemanga a kakivangvangan racev saka masan tjalja pungadan. lja ika mirazek a siubay, saka sedjel a kacalisian, sivitay kata kumuing. azua pakata sinkiw a tadjalan a sidjiyan kumintang a tjaliaw, ljakua mata 1992 a cavilj, livawiyuan a sinkiw, aza na mindjingtang ti 黃信介 a kamakama djemamaq tua kalingu king a livawiyuan. au avan zua makeljang anga mindjingtang i kalingu. == mareqali i gaikuku ==

kalingo king (pinaywanan:kalingo；pinairangan:Hoa-lian-koān / Hoa-liân-koān；nginaingayngan:Fâ-lièn-yen)izoa taota sicoayan a ngadan cilay , hoilan (pinairangan:Hoê-liân),doloman (a sipanya kai:Toroboan；pinairangan:To-lô-boán)avan nangata ca king noa i taiwan. imaza i pasakacedas toa taiwan, izoa peihoikoisiyen pakamaza. a i pasakaledep a gadogadoan i vecekadan toa taiwan, a i toa sevecevec ljavek a gadogadoan imaza i pasacemedas, a i tjaikacedas mavan a taipingyan (ljavek a viliping), a i viri nakidjekec toa yilan, a i pasakaledep a viri nakidjekec toa taicio hici, a i kaledep nakidjekec toa nantoking, a i pasakaledep a navalj nakidjekec toa takaw hici, a i navalj nakidjekec toa taitoking. izoa to 4,628 km² a polingetjan noa kadjonangan. a tjaljaqacavan a king i taiwan. kalingoking izoa tjatjorovoan a kacalisian, tjalja liavan amizoko. ao aza caocao a mamaza i pasaviri a kalingo a sema taito sevesevec a lizolizok pakaljaviljaving ta ljavek a kadjonangan, ao avan ca ika kinapalak nanemanemanga a kakivangvangan racev saka masan tjalja pongadan, izoa tairogo noa koka kinakalevelevan kadjonangan kata yosan noa koka kinakalevelevan kadjonangan. aza kinipovarong toa na king a hata avan za cemedas a qadaw kemasi ljavek a ljivavaw. ao sinipokelang taljar noa taipingyan. aza taljar pinaka papapiliqe toa mareka zoko a qoljaw, izoa amizoko, tairoko zoko, bonon zoko, kemalan zoko, sacilaya zoko, sidiqe zoko kata pairang. saka ka 2013 a cavilj, na djemamek toa tjaljabolayan a kakaizoanan a hici masan daisanmin. aza caocao i hoalian hici, djian goan kata sincen goan mata drosa poloq kodraw, masan tjaljaqacavan, tjalja talidoan, tjalja salengowaq a hici i pasakacedasan a kadjonangan. kadjonangan a kinalangan noa kadjonangan ladroladroq i kalingo king saka mato kaiko, maka ljaviljaving kemasi viri patje navalj to 137.5 km, a kemasi kacedas patje keledep kimaya 43 km. imaza a polingetjan noa kadjonangan masan a tjaljaqacavan a king i taiwan. ljakoa tjaliaw a gado izoa, keri to 10% a kazatjan pakata penoljat ta kadjonangan. aza mareka caocao sedjelja i kalingo kata valangaw sevesevec a lizolizok. ao izoa to 70% a caocao sedjelja i hoalien hici kata djian goan. aico gado imaza a pasakacedas a ljavek a gadogadoan, a pasakaledep sedjel a gadogadoan i vecekadan toa taiwan. a lava izoa to 3 mata 9 km a pasalavan. aico kadjonangan pakata sevesevec a lizolizok kata avan za nakemasi gado seqaljotj a qipo kata vodas masan lizolizo, a qivo kalingo kata valangaw sevesevec a lizolizok toki kalingo kata valangaw a kasintan. aza kadjonangan pakata pasaviri sedjel kalingo kata valangaw sevesevec a lizolizok, kemasi congde a disiaba i siolin goan pasanavalj mata hoalien siljitaladj i pana, ao aza kemasi sincen mola i sincen goan mata govo mola i hoalien hici a 15 km a tideq, na lizok a laroq kata lavan pinapamaw nasekeljan to malji, a tjalja lavan kimaya 5 km a tjeza, saka a qivo "kalingo kata valangaw a kasintan", notja kinemenemen ca ljosepisepitj a lizok kinadjonangan, avan no kemasi liwo pana izaya naseqaljotj a vadas kata qaciljay, lja namakeren a mavali toa pasakacedas ma viri a kemaledep a masan, coayanga djiqeseng noa zaljom aza i toa siljisaaw ljavek a mareke vodas, pasa navaljen a kacoing avan no sika alang, kata na tjalja taladjan a kadjonangan sirarowa neka ravac a kanki. lja aico a ljaviljaving a gadogadoan i pasakacedas a kalingoking tja kigaljo a ma alang(kimaya 400 kodraw tjaisangas a inalangan), a ljavavavan tja liaw pitja keri toa i pasaviri a vecekadan gadogadoan, tjalja vavavan avan za sinking gado izoa 1682m. a maka ljaviljjaving a gado kinaqipoan liaw a vodavodas na lomeljak maqepo masan qaciljay, a kinakadjonangan madjolo a makapalak, lja nororalaroa a tjataladj a kadjonangan, aico a makaljaving a gado no icining ljivavae to 3cm, aza i siokoloan pana qaciljaciljaing izoa caleqilj lomeljak a maletimalji masan alang toa vikivikng, avan no liaw qaca keri maljetimalji a lizok I toa ljaving naljavek a gadogadoan, pacoal ta i roisoi goan kacedasan navalj a cimi lizok, tjalja laroqan kata tjalja milavan kimaya izoa 2 km, kalingo 64 goan a djaljang (花64鄉道) sipakacevong noa lisoy kata vonbing a djalang angata. izoa tjalja tjorovoan a gado i kalingo king, izoa 43 a gado tjljaqaca mata 3000 m. izoa nanho gado , cilay gado , siokoloan gado ,womin gado , akana hehoan gado i pasakacedasan . aza liaw pana imaza seqaljodj kemasai kaledep pasa cemedas. ljakoa aico heping pana, liwo pana kata siogoloan pana seqaljodj kemasi viri pasa navalj. ao izoa hoalien pana seqaljodj kemasi navalj pasa viri. aico maka ljaviljaving ta ljavek i pasakacedas a kalingo to 124 km, lja liaw a pana maljavek, liaw a kadjonangan a temalimozav, izoa cevaceva maka ljavek, avan angata i pasanavalj a heping pana aza cinsoi danggay, izoa tjaljaqaca 1000 m, masan ta pongadangadan a kivangavangan i sohoa konglo, ljakoa izoa roconoq ota pakata qodjalj saka ika maqati qemalios. ao aico i pasanavalj kalingo king a semen makaljaving, namasan tjacaleqilj a ljaviljaving poqaciljayven, izoa liaw a napakisomalji noa kadjonangan a temalimozav, izoa setiping pakanavalj, aza kinaqaciljayan mato a tjaljitjali paka italadj a ljavek, izoanan kinapalak noa zaljom a namasa gisoi, dangai, kaizatjan, paljevavaw a maljimalji a qaciljay, aza i makaljaving toa ljavek avan za babelobeloan a masan talitoan i taiwan. kalevelevan cinalivatan ka sicoayan a qivo cilay, pakata "花蓮縣志" za vecik, ka 1622 a cavilj azoa sipanya caocao semamaza a djadjasen ta king, ao sematjez patje djinbaoli (i djinsan ci atalasi taihoko hici toco), saka sinpongadan doloman aico avan toco sincen mola, a kacalisian a kinaizoanan. ka 1851 a cavilj, izoa tjawcikel na semamaza a pairang a qemolic a temalem ta lami, ao pacon ta pana sema ljavek, macacovong qaca a lodolodan, azoa ridio mato voliljaoljaw, avan anga ta sinpongadan hoilan. ao pavalitan ta pinairangan tjasedjaljep siqivo a hoalian. tja kigaljo a mirazek i kalingo pakata zoma king, ka 1932 a cavilj, nekanan na sipakaljaving a djalan (sicoayan a sohoa konglo), no remaketj sikipacacikel maka kalingo pakavarokorokor, avan no izoa angata italadj qinaljan ao mano sinan i casaw a kadjonangan aya qivo. mata qamaqacovong a lemindjel toa kisiya a djalan a cemalivat toa taiwan i pasa viri, naseljengowaq a sipakazoa djalan. pakata remasodj a kilalaing takakodan, ka 1909 a cavilj, kalinko a kadjonangan kidjovecik valangaw, masan ta kalingokang ting, avan kanri a macidjilj patje toco. kapoamin a maqaqeci, ka 1946 a cavilj icigac siva qadaw lemindjel toa kalingo king. ka 1950 a cavilj ziogac poloq sa lima qadaw, masantjasangas a king a semoso toa niamadjo a rarasodjan pakata "conghoamingo a tjaljavavaw a holic". kanri toa na i qinaljan a kakodan. kinapangaljan a paljavak izoa siolin, wanrong, zosi avan angata na kacalisian a qinaljan, ao polingetjan noa kadjonangan penoljat avan to alo poloq noa kalingo king a kadjonangan. aza siolin avan na tjaljaqacavan a kadjonangan, to 1,641 km², avan angata tjaljaqacavan a kadjonangan pakata masantjelolj a kinapangaljan a paljavak, tjaljaqavan ta sinzoking kata canhoaking. aza yiliceng a kadjonangan to 252 km², masan tjaljaqacavan pakata ceng i taiwan. hoalien hici kata sincen goan izoa mamaw a polingetjan noa kadjonangan (to 29.4095 km²), madrosa avan angata tjaljakedrian pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak i kalingo. caocao · ljemeqaca:neka · mirazek:siolin · ika pasekakezeng:sincen ,djian · sisekez:zosi ,vonglin · mekedri:zovong ,voli ,koangvo ,lisoy · selapay mekedri:wanrong ,hoalien hichi ,yili ,vongbin aico a pakeljan ta caocao i kalingo king: aza mareka caocao sedjelja i hoalien hici kata djian goan. aico a caocao i cen (yilicen kata vonglincen) tjalja kerian a caocao i djian goan, ao aico a caocao penoljat madrosa a ceng tjalja kedrian ta i djian goan a caocao. maloa a caocao i vonglin, 90 a caocao /km², avan angata tjalja kerian a mavalidan i taiwan. aico a caocao i djian goan to alo kodraw, avan angata tjalja tjorovoan a goan i taiwan. pakata caocao a mavalidan avan pitjavavaw 100 a caocao /km², izoa hoalien hici, djian goan kata sincen goan. aico zirio patekoteko kemasi 2021 a cavilj sangac 資料 kakivaovaljan:Wayback zoko ka 1926 a cavilj aza zirio pakata semopo ta caocao a penoljat, izoa 9900 a caocao nasevodjan, 7200 a caocao nasekoangdong. (ka cinting a djiday kata min a djiday pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak izoa vodjansen kata koangdongsen) lja tja kigaljo a mirazek, izoa tjatjorovoan a sikakodan na kacalisian imaza: izoa amizoko, taiya zoko, tairoko zoko, bonon zoko, sacilaya zoko, kemalan zoko, sidiqe zoko i kalingo. pakata zirio ka 2016 a cavilj sepatj qiljas, a caocao na kacalisian i kalingo, izoa 56,362 a caocao i lizok, izoa 35,830 a coacao i gado, ao a caocao a penoljat avan 92,192. avan angata ta 25 % toa kalingo a caocao a penoljat. ao tjaljaqacavan a kadjonangan a amizoko. saka izoa taota 30 % a ngaingai zoko, pirang kata ciyokok zoko i maza. nasidjaravacan sinopoan aza zirio ka 2009 a cavilj pakata kalingo siho, toco izoa lima a daigako, poloq sa tjelo a kaocong a gako, drosa poloq sa sepatj a gako na kotjong kata taiday sa pitjo a gako na kokomin. ljakoa a caocao sedjelj a nasemasasaw, ao memapoljo a sito, izoa gako rinevoranga. kakipocemelan kivangavangan pakata zirio a "台灣博物館名錄" ka 2004 a cavilj siva qiljas, izoa sasqetjan ta paridio a sicoacoayan a nanemanga omaq i kalingoking : a i kalingo rioko mirazek aravac, sasangowaq a kadjonangan izoa tairoko a noa koka kakivangvangan, kalingo sema taito sevesevecan a lizolizok kata paka ljaviljaving. a remayorangan a sengsegnan temalido aravac, saka liaw a kasioljayan a omaq, mata siva taiday a makalap, ao izoa liaw a racev, vencik toa kasiw,vencik toa qaciljay, vorasi a cinekoro aljoaljo,yokan, mareka maljaljian a qaciljay. aza zirio pakata caocao kivanvang a semamaza pakata zirio a koankoangcy na kalingo kingsiho ka 2019 a cavilj pitjo qiljas, aza caocao kivanvang a semamaza to 1,352,774. izoa to 281,500 a caocao sema dongdamen yachi, izoa to 34,775 a caocao sema i nanan pakata sasekezan kata papavelian a kakitoloan. avan angata tjaljavavavan ta vecik pitjaivililj. ao aza penoljat a caocao semamaza ka 2019 a cavilj 10,956,540. (penapamapamaw lemita qiljas avan 913,045 a caocao), masan a sangasangasan. sinkiw aico a kalingo king i pasakacedas noa i taiwan, izoa malji a qivo "pasaliko ta gado". avan no tjaljaqacavan a kadjonangan a king i taiwan. avan ca ika kinapalak nanemanemanga a kakivangvangan racev saka masan tjalja pongadan. lja ika mirazek a siobay, saka sedjel a kacalisian, sivitay kata komoing. azoa pakata sinkiw a tadjalan a sidjiyan komintang a tjaliaw, ljakoa mata 1992 a cavilj, livawiyoan a sinkiw, aza na mindjingtang ti 黃信介 a kamakama djemamaq toa kalingo king a livawiyoan. ao avan zoa makeljang anga mindjingtang i kalingo. == mareqali i gaikoko ==
